original_title: Buck Southworth: U.S. Air Force Flight Crew
overview: Buck Southworth's life as an Air Force aircrewman narrated by his wife, Priscilla Southworth, now a volunteer at Cape Canaveral National Cemetery, she tells a story about her husband, bravery, dedication to the mission and love.
tagline: A wife recalls the love of her life and his service.
title: Buck Southworth: U.S. Air Force Flight Crew
